author: Narayan Lakshman
title: Limits to rugged individualism
description: By the time the U.S. adopts tough measures to fight COVID-19, it might be too late
content: As the global battle against COVID-19 progresses, it is beginning to reveal deep fault lines in the national psyches of countries that are facing the prospect of high infection rates. India has acted aggressively by shutting down international travel routes a… [+3224 chars]
